title: Thomas O'Brian Memorial Fund for Graduate Student Support at JILA
description: To provide financial support, which may include research related expenses, for graduate students enrolled at the University and studying at JILA. Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures established and administered within JILA.
marketingContent: To provide financial support, which may include research related expenses, for graduate students enrolled at the University and studying at JILA. Recipients will be selected in accordance with procedures established and administered within JILA.
